channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FELIX-1647] Removal of repository from config causes errors due to corrupted repository table
item.description:

item.summary: Removal of repository from config causes errors due to corrupted repository table

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Patch provided to log corruption as error vs throwing runtime error which locks up IDE.
Will create secondary issue to ensure table doesn't get corrupted on removal.
